Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.journal

Interface EncodingSupport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConnectionFactoryConfiguration, PagedMessage, PageTransactionInfo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressSettings, AddressStatusEncoding, BatchingIDGenerator.IDCounterEncoding, BufferSplitter.PartialEncoding, ByteArrayEncoding, ConnectionFactoryConfigurationImpl, CursorAckRecordEncoding, DeleteEncoding, DeliveryCountUpdateEncoding, DivertConfiguration, DuplicateIDEncoding, GroupingEncoding, HeuristicCompletionEncoding, JournalAddRecord, JournalAddRecordTX, JournalCompleteRecordTX, JournalDeleteRecord, JournalDeleteRecordTX, JournalInternalRecord, JournalRollbackRecordTX, PageCountPendingImpl, PageCountRecord, PageCountRecordInc, PagedMessageImpl, PageTransactionInfoImpl, PageUpdateTXEncoding, PendingLargeMessageEncoding, PersistedAddressSetting, PersistedBindings, PersistedBridgeConfiguration, PersistedConnectionFactory, PersistedDestination, PersistedDivertConfiguration, PersistedKeyValuePair, PersistedRole, PersistedSecuritySetting, PersistedUser, PersistentAddressBindingEncoding, PersistentQueueBindingEncoding, QueueEncoding, QueueStatusEncoding, RefEncoding, ResourceLimitSettings, ScheduledDeliveryEncoding, XidEncoding
    public interface EncodingSupport
    This interface provides encoding support for the Journal.
